name: Proto Persona Creation Kit
description:
I am happy to share my weekend project called ''Proto persona creation kit'' with you!


I can define the project as a proto persona creation kit in the shortest way. As designers, we often need to quickly create a persona after extensive research. So I wanted to build a system where you can create your proto persona quickly for this need.


What's ınside?


28 Avatar Variants

-10 Tagline Variants

-30+ Personality Variants

-30+ Occupation Variants

-10 Persona Example


If you have any question please contact to me.

sapcilarseren@gmail.com


Thank you all!
